goals__remit: As an lawyer admitted to the Paris (France) and Luxembourg Bars, I am active in national company law and  European company law dealing with cross border reorganizations of companies. My clients are international groups, listed or unlisted companies, SMEs. I participated to the setting up of many European Companies (Societas Europaea, SE) in France and in Luxembourg. I work in cooperation with lawyers of many countries.
relevant_communication:
I am speaker at international conferences and lecture at Universities.  
 
Lecturer on the practice of cross-border reorganizations and of the European Company (SE) at:  
•    Master 2 Ingénierie des sociétés , Institut de Droit des Affaires, University P. Cézanne, Aix-Marseille 3 (dir. Prof. David Bosco). 
•    Master Corporate Strategy and Finance in Europe, Institut d’Etudes Politiques of Strasbourg (dir. Prof. Laurent Weill). 
•    Master 2 Opérations et fiscalité internationales des sociétés, University Paris 1-Sorbonne (dir. Prof. Michel Menjucq). 
•    Master 2 Droit international et européen des affaires, University Paris – Dauphine (dir. Prof. Juliette Morel-Maroger). 
•    Master 2 Ingénierie juridique et financière des sociétés, University of Bordeaux (dir. Prof. Bernard Saintourens & Bâtonnier Philippe Duprat).
